attributes.action: Candidates to parliament to clearly state their position on the eu and referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The  minimum issues to be covered by them would be:
1. For or against a referendum.
2 maximum delay before referendum held.
3 if they would be prepared to resign if not held within that time.
4 if they support joining the euro
5 if they support handing over further powers to Brussels
6 if they support leaving the eu if fundamental changes not negotiated and what the minimum changes they would consider acceptable.
